salesforce_select_fields: Name, Id, LastName, FirstName, AccountId, RecordTypeId, CreatedDate, LastModifiedDate, Title, Description, LastActivityDate, npe01__Organization_Type__c, Birthdate__c, Veteran_Status__c, Disability_Status__c, npsp__Primary_Affiliation__c, Referring_Organization__c, Birthdate, MailingStreet, MailingCity, MailingState, MailingPostalCode, MailingCountry, MailingStateCode, Phone, Email, npe01__Type_of_Account__c, npe01__WorkPhone__c, npe01__Work_Address__c, MobilePhone, LinkedIn__c
salesforce_condition: Id in (SELECT ContactId FROM Opportunity WHERE RecordTypeId = '0123p000000EILEAA4')
salesforce_condition2: Id in (SELECT ConvertedContactId FROM Lead WHERE Role__c ='Partner' AND CreatedDate >= 2024-07-01T00:00:00Z AND ConvertedContactId != null)
